Camera.Features:: Face Detection, Digital Zoom (2.0x), HDR, Grid Line, Watermark (Frame & Regular), Camera Mute, Touch Shooting, Self-Timer, Grid Line, Volume Key Function, Anti Flicker, Mirror

Design.SIM:: Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by 4G VoLTE, VoWIFI)
Design.Others:: IP68 Waterproof Rating Test, Shock Test, Temperature Shock Test, Drop Test, Vibration Test

Display.Protection:: Panda MN228 Glass Protection & Mohs level 6

Connectivity & Features.WLAN:: Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g/n, dual-band, WiFi Direct, hotspot
Connectivity & Features.GPS:: Yes, GPS, GALILEO, GLONASS, BDS, QZSS
Connectivity & Features.Sensors:: Fingerprint (under display), accelerometer, proximity, compass, gravity, gyroscope, geomagnetic
